attributes.action: protect and maintain funding for the vital services that Further Education provides.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Education broadens the skill base of the community and economy making it more resilient and creating the platform for future growth and recovery. 
At a time when the nation needs Further Education more than ever, to cap and cut funding is extremely short-sighted. Shortfalls in capital funding and funding cuts in the name of “efficiency” savings will result in fewer training opportunities for the unemployed and a wave of job losses across Further and Adult Education.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "protect and maintain funding for the vital services that Further Education provides."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
